Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Narrowly dodging Korolev\'s energy beam, "Tall Guy" feels his left arm go numb.'}
{3: 'The burnt smell of protein fills his nostrils, reminding him of the fire that took his voice and face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Korolev', 3: 'According to space station regulations, members are obliged to assist Korolev with demonstrations.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Korolev', 3: 'To help the kids learn more, please cooperate.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It raises its claw, intending to demonstrate the structure of the human body.'}
{2: 'Korolev', 3: 'Next, we will begin disassembling this model.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The extinguisher clangs against the metal casing.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Korolev turns around with a hint of confusion in its massive eye.'}
{2: 'Korolev', 3: 'When visiting the space station, please follow the rules and regulations and listen to your guide.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Korolev', 3: 'Korolev is okay with touching and graffiti. Theft and vandalism are prohibited and will be punished accordingly.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It raises the fallen extinguisher, ready to throw it.'}
{3: "The extinguisher explodes and white powder instantly obscures everyone's vision."}
{3: 'The Corrupted swings its claws wildly, leaving deep scratches everywhere.'}
{2: 'Korolev', 3: "Korolev Trivia: In a 21°C environment, 60% of the human's body heat is dissipated through radiation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Korolev', 3: 'So under thermal imaging, you can see...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A claw pierces through the powder cloud, heading toward the researcher, but freezes in mid-air.'}
{3: 'An electrified cable bound it tightly, with a tall soldier pressing his full weight on the other end.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Manager', 3: "Can't you see? That cable was shot from his weapon and needs to be maintained by him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Manager', 3: "If we don't leave now, we'll all die here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Manager', 3: "Damn it, I still can't see anything...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Philip', 3: 'Let\'s go. We\'ll need an escape pod if we want to save "Tall Guy".', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She grits her teeth and follows the drone and the two others.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Manager', 3: 'Damn it, the escape pods are ruined!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A trembling Philip gets shunted aside, and with the click and whir of buttons, the broadcast light flickers green.'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: "Space station calling for help! We're under attack!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'But neither the Starship Fleet nor the spaceport responds.'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: "Space station calling for help! We're under attack!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'When despair crushes reason, pleas for help turn into whimpers.'}
{3: 'The violent banging outside the safety door, is that the countdown to our doom?'}
{3: 'For the first time, she feels the urge to pray to a god she never believed in.'}
{2: 'Korolev', 3: 'Anyone who refuses to open the door...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: '"Tall Guy", like bait on a fishing line, leaves bloodstains with each impact.'}
{3: "He was never a smart guy. If it were someone else, they'd have a better plan, right?"}
{3: 'What would the security chief, who always complained and talked about retirement, do?'}
{3: "But he's already nailed to the wall, surrounded by the remains of dozens of Corrupted."}
{3: 'What about the colleague who always mocked him for not speaking?'}
{3: "But a crushed head can't make a sound again."}
{3: 'As he bleeds out, "Tall Guy" can feel his consciousness fading.'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: 'That button over there is the airlock. Never open it on your own.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Philip', 3: "The vacuum outside creates a pressure difference... Never mind, I'll just tell you the result.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Philip', 3: 'You know Korolev, right? Even something that massive will get sucked into space if you press the button.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Philip', 3: "Not to mention us. But sometimes it's the fastest way to deal with accumulated debris...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With his sole remaining arm, he crawls to the airlock button.'}
{3: 'The immense pressure difference instantly sucks both him and Korolev into space. Although Korolev manages to grab a metal panel with its claw, it is barely holding on.'}
{3: 'At first, "Tall Guy" thought the void of space would be cold, but his boiling blood is making him feel warm.'}
{3: 'He feels as if he has returned to the day he first arrived at the space station.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Philip', 3: "You're the new security guy. What's your name?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: 'Hmm... you\'re pretty tall, how about we call you "Tall Guy"?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jada', 3: "If you have objections, then it's settled.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: "Let's have a meal together and get to know each other.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Philip', 3: "You don't want to? Or do you prefer eating alone?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He hesitates for a moment before taking off his helmet and revealing the scarred face from the fire.'}
{2: 'Philip', 3: 'No one will treat you differently for looking like this.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Sometimes, a small act of kindness and fair treatment is enough to brighten someone's day."}
{3: 'In this disaster, kindness is the best reward.'}
{3: 'Congealed blood slowly covers his eyes, and his world falls into a warm darkness.'}
{3: 'After ending communication with them, everyone breathes a sigh of relief.'}
{3: 'They promise to get here as quickly as possible, and most importantly...'}
{2: 'Philip', 3: 'There will be a military Construct, which means even "Tall Guy" can be saved.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Manager', 3: 'Wait... why did the crashing sound stop?', 4: '3'}
{3: 'A strange feeling arises and everyone looks at the drone that has stopped moving on the floor.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'At some point, it has ceased to function, leaving only one final message.'}
